thread.title: A Rant About the Man in Charge

author: Hemant Mehta
title: A Rant About the Man in Charge
text:
« Cheating Principal Who Attributed Kids’ High Test Scores to Prayer Receives Harsh Punishment About Hemant Mehta 
Hemant Mehta is the editor of Friendly Atheist, appears on the Atheist Voice channel on YouTube, and co-hosts the uniquely-named Friendly Atheist Podcast . You can read much more about him here .
